mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SID, CORPID, PROJECTID, CATEGORYID, UNIT, STATUS, BRANDID, BRAND, MANUFACTUREID, MANUFACTURE, ORIGIN, ORIGINAREA, STOCKPRICE, COSTPRICE, SELLPRICE, BATCHPRICE1, BATCHPRICE2, BATCHPRICE3, BATCHPRICE4, STORAGEID, STORAGE, LOCATIONID, LOCATION, WEIGHT, SIZES, COLOR, BARCODE, AVAILTIME, ALIAS1, ALIAS2, ALIAS3, PICTURE1, PICTURE2, PICTURE3, PICTURE4, BUYFLAG, BUYNUM, SAVENUM, ORDERNUM, ALERTNUM, LEVELS, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, TRANSLATEFLAG, PRICEFLAG, CONTENTFLAG, PICFLAG, DESIGNFLAG, PUBLICFLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, RESERVE6, RESERVE7, RESERVE8, RESERVE9, RESERVE10, MANUFACTUREID2, MANUFACTURE2, MANUFACTUREID3, MANUFACTURE3, CHECKSTOCKOPER, CHECKSTOCKTIME, PRICE1, PRICE2, PRICE3, PRICE4, PRICE5, PRICE6, PRICE7, PRICE8, ITEMNO, OPER1, OPER2, OPER3, OPER4, OPER5, OPER6, ALERTFLAG, PACKAGINGID, PACKAGINGWEIGHT, ERRORFLAG, GROUPID, DECLAREDVALUE, NAME, CONTENT, DESCR, TRANSLATE1, TRANSLATE2, TRANSLATE3, TRANSLATE4, OTHERCONTENT, SHOPTYPE, SALESOURCE, CLOBCONTENT, CLOBDESCR, CLOBTRANSLATE, ALERTDESCR, PACKAGINGNAME, DBCLASS, ERRORINFO from db_product_temp where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
